-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 1:54 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Egroups problem


check the email address in your reply. I had problems with that for about
two weeks, then it changed overnight and started working again. Until it
fixed itself I had to paste in the email address on all my replies as it
wasn't being picked up correctly.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 12:41 PM
To: EQ Bards
Subject: [eqbards] Egroups problem


For some reason- my new posts make it through - but replies don't. They
don't bounce - just never make it to the list. I recently changed email
addresses and updated it through their web page (the problem cropped up at
that time).

Anyone have any ideas?

Thanks

Slyde
